item.title: Transformer
item.description: Table of Contents 1. Model Architecture 1.1 Encoder and Decoder 1.2 Attention 1.3 Position-wise Feed-Forward Networks 1.4 Embeddings and Softmax 1.5 Positional Encoding 1.6 Full Model 2. Training 2.1 Optimizer 2.2 Regularization 3. Other “Attention is all you need” is a paper published on NIPS2017, conducted by 8 excellent machine learning scientists when they were in Google Brain.
